### Murrel Pereira

#### *Biostatistics Master's student, Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health*

I am a bioprocessing engineer and data scientist in the Process Development group at Regeneron Pharmaceuticals. I'm currently pursuing a part-time master's in biostatistics at Columbia University to broaden my knowledge within the biotechnology industry.
